format: Shell/Makefile-like syntax (most likely bitbake or Yocto recipe configuration)
description: This file defines configuration defaults, capabilities, and includes for the ARMv7em architecture within a Yocto project or similar build system. It sets tuning parameters, compiler arguments, machine overrides, and includes other related configuration files.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility method for conditional inclusion based on feature presence
